6.  JDataStore

Example 2.3.  Example properties for JDataStore 

openjpa.ConnectionDriverName: com.borland.datastore.jdbc.DataStoreDriver
openjpa.ConnectionURL: jdbc:borland:dslocal:db-jdatastore.jds;create=true
